name: Dualiteau
description:
This was my first game made for a jam ever and I'm quite proud of it! This was made for Paint Jam 2020.

General mechanics - 

When you click play, you can chose the size of the level (Tableau), and then the game will generate a level with the size you chose, you will spawn as a Blue "tile", which you can move by using W A S D keys on your keyboard, then your goal is to avoid the red and orange tiles and get the furthest you can in the level.

Behind the scenes -

I spent like, 10 minutes looking at Tableau I, and after some time, I decided it would make a game where you can walk in the Tableau, and because of the way it looks, I decided it would be randomly generated. The game was made in about, 24 hours (Not including sleep time)

Softwares used : MS Paint, Audacity, Game Maker: Studio 1.4, GMEditand Paint.net(Only for transparency)
